198521.「……はじめまして <pc>さん。\n 私の名は パッキュレ。\n 見てのとおり:
...Nice to meet you <pc>. My name is
Pakkure. As you can see, I am a priest.

198522.「人目につかぬよう 密かに記した\n 私のメッセージに たやすく 気づくとは。\:
I am amazed that you could easily notice my message, which I secretly wrote down to keep it hidden from the public eye. Your eye for
observation is frightening.

198523.「それゆえか 我が友人であるパクレは\n あなたのことを 危険人物と判断して\n:
That is why my friend Pakul has told me that
he is going to eliminate you as a dangerous
person.

198524.「ですが 私の考えは 異なります。\n あなたほどのチカラの持ち主ならば\n ぜ:
But I have a different opinion. I believe that
a man as powerful as you are should by all
means be brought into our side.

198525.「そこで あなたのことを試したく\n 依頼を果たしてもらいたい……というわけです:
So, we want to test you and have you fulfill
our request....

198526.「あれれー？ あんた\n パクレのオヤジじゃないのー？: Oh, no? Aren't you Pakul's father?

198527.「最近 店に来ないと思ったら\n 神父に 転職しちゃってたみたいな？\n ぜんぜ:
I haven't seen you in the store lately, but it
seems you've changed your job to a priest. It
doesn't suit you at all, it's really funny.

198528.「なんですか あなたは。\n 私は パッキュレ神父と 申す者。\n 断じて パク:
What are you? I am Father Pakkure. I am not
Inspector Pakul...

198529.「あはははーっ。\n なに そのしゃべり？\n パクレのくせに ナマイキだぞー。:
Ha-ha-ha-ha. What are you talking like that
for? You're a Pacul, but you're so naive!

198530.「なになに？ この神父さんって\n 本当は パクレ警部なの！？:
What is it? This priest is really Inspector
Pakul!

198531.「あっ もしかして 変装しての捜査中？\n うわあ すっごいや！！:
Ah, could it be that you're investigating in
disguise? Wow, that was amazing!

198532.「ええー 変装なのー？\n こんな ヘタクソな変装ってアリ？:
Oh, my God, is that a disguise? Is this really
such a bad disguise?

198533.「……ええいっ！\n 私は パッキュレ神父なのだっ。\n パクレ警部では ないっ:
...Yes! I am Father Pakkure. I am not
Inspector Pakul!

198534.「お前たちなど 知らん！\n とっとと ここから 立ち去れーっ！！:
I don't care about any of you! Get the hell
out of here!

198536.「ほらほら ぼうや！\n お姉さんと いっしょに\n こわいオジサンから 逃げま:
Come on, boy! Let's run away from the scary
old man with your sister!

198537.「……えっ えっ？\n ちょっと 待ってよ。\n ボクは パクレ警部と もっと…:
...Eh? Wait a minute. I'm Inspector Pakul. I'm
more of a...

198538.「ふう……。\n 思わぬ邪魔が 入ってしまいましたが\n 話の続きと まいりまし:
Well... I'm sorry for the unexpected
interruption, but let's continue the story,
shall we?

198539.「ドルワーム王国にて 発生している\n とある事件の 調査と解決……。\n それ:
You have been asked to investigate and solve a
case that has been occurring in Dolworm
Kingdom.

198540.「城下町の民家に マクリマという女性が\n 住んでいるのですが その夫 バァツェ:
A woman named Makurima lives in a private
house in the castle town, and her husband,
Bahtze, has suddenly become a changed man.

198541.「何者かがバァツェ氏と 入れ替わっているのか\n はたまた 新たな人格が 芽生え:
Either someone has replaced Mr. Bahtze, or a
new personality has sprung up.

198542.「いずれにしても このまま 放置しておけば\n 彼と その家族だけの問題では 収:
In any case, I have a feeling that if left unchecked, the problem will not be confined to him and his family, but will endanger the
world as well.

198543.「至急 ドルワーム王国へ向かい\n マクリマさんのもとを 訪れてください。:
Please head to Dolworm Kingdom ASAP and visit
Ms. Makurima.

198544.「この依頼を果たせれば 我が友人パクレも\n あなたの処遇を 考え直すことでしょ:
If you fulfill this request, my friend Pakul
will reconsider your treatment. If you want to
live, go for it.

198545.「今後 私から 連絡があるときは\n この木箱に 記すことにします。\n 調査に:
I will post a note in this crate whenever I
hear from you. If you get stuck in your
research, you may want to take a look.

198546.「では 私は これにて……。: Well, I'll leave you to it.

198547.「……武器の数に 異常なし。\n 品質チェックなんか やってられるか……。:
...unarmed counts. I don't have time for
quality checks.

198549.「ああ。はやく 行かなきゃ。: Oh, I've got to go. I gotta go.

198550.「あいつも オレに 会いたいはずだ……。: I'm sure he'd love to meet me.

198551.「……なんだ あんたは。\n ここは 立ち入り禁止だぞ。\n 今すぐに 出ていっ:
What the hell are you doing? You can't be in
here. I want you out of here right now.

198552.「はやく 砂漠のオアシスに 行かなきゃ。\n あいつに いやしてもらうんだ……。:
We need to get to the desert oasis. I'm gonna
make him sick...

198553.「おやおや……。ここに来て\n 捜査が行きづまった……という感じですかな。:
Oh well... I guess the investigation has come
to a standstill here....

198554.「……なるほど。たとえ あなたでも\n これを 外から 開けることは\n むずか:
I see. I must say that even you would find it
difficult to open this from the outside.

198555.「いたしかた ありません。\n ここは 特別に 私の知恵をお貸ししましょう。:
There is nothing I can do. Let me lend my
wisdom specially here.

198556.「外にいる者に 開けられない扉……\n それを開けるには どうすれば よいのか？:
How do you open a door that cannot be opened
by those on the outside?

198557.「答えは ひとつしか ありません。\n 中にいる者に 開けてもらえば よいのです:
There is only one answer. Let those who are
inside open the door.

198558.「……ふむ。アレで いきましょう。\n あなたは 次の材料を 集めてください。:
Let's go with that. Let's go with it. You
gather the following materials.

198559.「まずは ここより北 デマトード高地などにいる\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME:
The first step is to get Smoky Balls, which are often dropped by Tyrannoceratops in the Dematode Highlands and other areas north of
here.

198560.「それと ようせいのひだねをひとつ。\n これは 武器鍛冶や防具鍛冶ギルドの\n:
And one Lamplight. You can get this at the
Material Shop in Weaponsmith Guild or Weapons
& Armorsmith Guild.

198561.「そのふたつの材料が あれば\n 煙を大量に発生させる 発煙筒を\n 作ることが:
With these two materials, you can make a smoke
tube that produces a lot of smoke.

198562.「……もう おわかりですね。\n 大量の煙を この扉のスキマから 送り込み\n:
You already know what I'm going to do. A lot
of smoke is pumped through the cracks in this
door to smoke out whoever is inside.

198563.「発煙筒の作り方も お教えしておきましょう。\n 材料さえあれば 簡単なものです:
Let me tell you how to make a smoke tube. It's
easy, as long as you have the right materials.

198564.<pc>は パッキュレ神父に\n発煙筒の作り方を 教えてもらった！:
<pc> got Father Pakkure to teach him
how to make a smoke tube!

198565.デマトード高地などで <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を倒し\nケムケム玉を手に:
After defeating Tyrannoceratops in Dematode Highlands or elsewhere and receiving the Smoky Ball, come back to the door of Sand Cave with
your Lamplight!

198566.「あとは あなたの手で おやりなさい。\n 忘れているかも しれませんが\n こ:
The rest is in your hands. In case you have
forgotten, this is your trial.

198567.「では 私は これにて……。: Well, I'll leave you to it.

198569.バァツェが いっしょにいたのは\nこのケダモンのようだ。:
It seems that Bahtze was accompanied by this
Feralbeast.

198570.しかし 明らかに ゴブル砂漠東にいる\n普通のケダモンとは 様子が 異なっている:
But it's clearly different from the normal
Feralbeasts of Goble Desert East...

198577.「おやおや。様子を見にきてみれば\n やっかいなモノが こちらに来ていましたな。:
Well, well, well. I came to check on you and
found that something troublesome has come this
way.

198578.「そやつには そんじょそこらの攻撃では\n 致命傷を与えることは できないのです:
You can't give it a mortal wound with just a
few attacks.

198579.「……ふむ。この姿では\n すこしばかり 格好が つきませんかな。:
Hm...hmm. I wonder if I look a little bit
uncouth in this form.

198580.「おどろいたかね？\n パッキュレ神父は 世を忍ぶ 仮の姿。\n その正体は ワ:
Surprised? Father Pakkure was a mask for the
world. His true identity was a disguise for I.

198581.「キミを 試したくてね。\n このような趣向を 用意させてもらった。:
I wanted to test you. I've prepared this
little quaintness for you.

198585.「あんたたちが ケダ子を いじめたのか……。: You guys are picking on Kedako...

198586.「ケダ子は かわいそうなヤツなんだぞ。\n なのに なんで こんなことを……。:
Kedako is a poor guy. So why are you doing
this...

198587.「許さないぞ あんたたち！！: I won't let you get away with this!!

198589.「この おぞましい魔物は なんなの？\n こんな毛玉みたいのが いいって言うの？:
What is this horrid monster? You want this
furball? Don't you love me anymore?

198591.「わーっ 待ってくれ！\n そんなんじゃ ないんだ！！: Whoa, wait! It's not like that!

198592.「オレが 愛しているのは お前だけだ！\n だが こいつは かわいそうなヤツなん:
You're the only one I love! But I feel sorry
for him.

198593.「こいつとは 砂漠で会った……。\n 他のケダモンに おそわれていたんだ。:
I met this guy in the desert... he was being
terrorized by another Feralbeast.

198594.「見た目が こんなだからだろう。\n きっと 仲間はずれに されちまったんだな。:
Maybe it's because he looks like this. I must
have been left out of the group.

198595.「ひどいケガをしていたから 助けて\n それからずっと ここで 面倒を見てたんだ:
He was badly hurt, so I helped him out, and
I've been taking care of him here ever since.

198596.「お前は 毛むくじゃらの魔物が いると\n クシャミが 止まらないだろう？\n:
You can't stop sneezing when there's a hairy
monster around, can you? That's why I couldn't
tell you about him.

198597.「このところ お前のことを\n ないがしろにしてしまったのは 悪かった。\n オ:
I'm sorry I've neglected you of late. Can you
forgive me?

198599.「いいの。もう ぜーんぶ ゆるしちゃうっ！！: It's okay. I forgive you all!

198601.「だが オレは結局 こいつを守れなかった……。: But I couldn't protect him after all.

198603.「ケダ子…… 死んじまったとばかり…………。: Kedako... I thought you were dead...

198604.「キズが ぜんぶ 治ってるぞ。\n どういうことだ……？:
All the scratches are healed. What's going
on...?

198605.「そうか……。あんたたちは\n こいつを 退治しに来たんじゃなかったのか。:
I see... I thought you guys came here to
exterminate this guy.

198608.「……ここまでだ。\n 追うのは やめておきたまえ。\n もう アレに関わらぬの:
That's it. Stop chasing it. It's better for
you if you don't get involved with that thing
anymore.

198609.「そう……。キミは 夢を見ていたのだよ。\n 真に 守らなければならぬ者のもとへ:
Yes... you were dreaming. Go back to those you
truly must protect.

198610.「……ああ そのとおりだ。\n あんたたちにも 迷惑をかけてしまったな。:
Yeah, that's right. I'm sorry I put you guys
through that too.

198613.「事件は 解決といったところか。\n ご苦労だったな <cs_pchero>君。:
I guess the case is closed. Thanks for your
efforts <cs_pchero>.

198614.「……ワガハイは もうひと任務あるので\n これで 失礼しよう。:
...I have one more assignment, so I'll leave
you now.

198615.「ああ。キミは この後 オルフェアの裏通りの\n 例の木箱を 確認したまえ。:
Yeah. You should check the crate in the
alleyway behind Orphea after this.
